FuncDef:
The dhcp option82 link-selection insert enable command enables the function of inserting the Sub5 field in Option 82 option on a DHCP relay interface.
The undo dhcp option82 link-selection insert enable command disables the function of inserting the Sub5 field in Option 82 option on the DHCP relay interface.
The dhcp option82 link-selection subnet-ip-address command configures the IP address corresponding to the Sub5 field in Option 82 on a DHCP relay interface.
The undo dhcp option82 link-selection subnet-ip-address command deletes the configured IP address corresponding to the Sub5 field in Option 82 on a DHCP relay interface.
By default, the function of inserting the Sub5 field in Option 82 option on the DHCP relay interface is disabled, no IP address is configured for the Sub5 field in Option 82.
CLIs: undo dhcp option82 link-selection insert enable

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the IP address corresponding to the Sub5 field in Option 82.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The dhcp option82 link-selection insert enable command enables the function of inserting the Sub5 field in Option 82 option on a DHCP relay interface.
To configure the IP address corresponding to the Sub5 field in Option 82 on a DHCP relay interface, run the dhcp option82 link-selection subnet-ip-address command.
Prerequisites
The function to insert information to Option 82 of DHCP packets is enabled using the dhcp option82 link-selection insert enable command.
